comment: Smart Data Models - ExcPIC adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcPIC/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Proportional/Integral Regulator Excitation System Model.  This model can be used to represent excitation systems with a proportional-integral (PI) voltage regulator controller.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: e1
contents.comment: Field voltage value 1 (E1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: e2
contents.comment: Field voltage value 2 (E2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efdmax
contents.comment: Exciter maximum limit (Efdmax).  Typical Value = 8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efdmin
contents.comment: Exciter minimum limit (Efdmin).  Typical Value = -0.87. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: PI controller gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 3.15. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Exciter regulation factor (Kc).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant (Ke).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Rate feedback gain (Kf).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Current source gain (Ki).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Potential source gain (Kp).  Typical Value = 6.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: se1
contents.comment: Saturation factor at E1 (Se1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: se2
contents.comment: Saturation factor at E2 (Se2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta1
contents.comment: PI controller time constant (Ta1).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: ta2
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Ta2).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

contents.name: ta3
contents.comment: Lead time constant (Ta3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: ta4
contents.comment: Lag time constant (Ta4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant (Te).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tf1
contents.comment: Rate feedback time constant (Tf1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tf2
contents.comment: Rate feedback lag time constant (Tf2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: vr1
contents.comment: PI maximum limit (Vr1).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vr2
contents.comment: PI minimum limit (Vr2).  Typical Value = -0.87. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Voltage regulator maximum limit (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Voltage regulator minimum limit (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -0.87. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
